about_the_game:
Step into the thrilling world of "Solid Chunks" where your keen eye and dedication are the keys to our society's success! In this fantastically hand-drawn comic book realm, our noble humanoid fly overlords have bestowed upon us the great honor of collecting their precious poo.

Embark on a grand adventure in a beautifully crafted cyberpunk dystopia, where finding every hidden poo is not just a task, but a glorious duty. Join the ranks of the elite poo hunters and prove your worth in this whimsical, yet essential mission. Glory awaits those who excel in the noble art of poo collection!

content_descriptors.notes:
Solid chunks is best described as "Heavy metal toilet humor"
It rocks!

Embark on a grand adventure in a beautifully crafted cyberpunk dystopia, where finding every hidden poo is not just a task, but a glorious duty. Join the ranks of the elite poo hunters and prove your worth in this whimsical, yet essential mission. Glory awaits those who excel in the noble art of poo collection!
name: Solid Chunks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
